addTemplate.description: Adds a template used for note creation. Select a PDF file and enter the template name.
addTemplate.title: Add Template

setting.description: While the Digital Paper App is running, it will automatically sync with the Digital Paper at specified intervals.

btautoconnect.description: Digital Paper App will automatically connect with the Digital Paper (i.e., as long as Bluetooth pairing has been completed).  Click {{link}} for details.

description.autosleep: The device will enter sleep mode after the set time has elapsed with no operation.
description.userName: Used for the document annotation author.

status.description:
Even if the Digital Paper is within range of radio waves, if the Wi-Fi connection status remains as "Disconnected" or "Connecting", it is possible that the saved information is not correct. Press "Back" and confirm settings.

To exit, press "Close".

wifiSettings.description: To set up the Wi-Fi of the Digital Paper, connect the Digital Paper to the computer using the USB cable, and turn on  [Wi-Fi of the Digital Paper]

init.noRegMsg:
Connect the Digital Paper to the computer using the USB Cable. Start the pairing process with the Digital Paper.
If the pairing setup window is not displayed on the computer screen, reconnect the USB cable.
The Digital Paper must be powered on to perform this operation.

noDeviceMsg.p2: It may take a few seconds to recognize the Digital Paper.
noDeviceMsg.p3: If the app is still not recognized after some time has passed, check the following:
noDeviceMsg.p4: The Digital Paper is switched on.
noDeviceMsg.p5:
If connecting via USB:
The Digital Paper and the computer are connected with a USB cable if connecting through USB.
noDeviceMsg.p6:
If connecting via the Bluetooth function:
The devices have been paired via Bluetooth.
noDeviceMsg.p7: To connect manually, press the following button:
noDeviceMsg.p8:
If connecting via Wi-Fi:
The Digital Paper is connected to a Wi-Fi network that can communicate with the computer.
noDeviceMsg.p9: Please see this if the connection still fails.

caption.noItemFV: There are no folders or documents.
caption.noItemSearch: Sorry, your search returned no results.

syncstate.error: Sync aborted due to an error.
syncstate.finish: Sync finished, but with one or more errors.
syncstate.unsynced: The device was not synced after the Digital Paper App was started.

app.launchSupportSite: Here the latest information and useful tips for using the Digital Paper are introduced.

exportOnDocView.message: Click the [Folders] from the toolbar, change the display mode and try again.
exportOnDocView.title: Transfer Documents to Digital Paper

description.copy:
A file with the same name already exists in the destination folder.

Filename
{{fileName}}
description.move:
A file with the same name already exists in the destination folder.

Filename
{{fileName}}

confirmDpPairing.message:
Unable to connect to Digital Paper.
If the network connection is unstable, select [Close] and reconnect in a place where communication is stable or connect with the USB.

When establishing a connection for the first time after initializing the Digital Paper, select [Reset connection information].
confirmDpPairing.title: Digital Paper App

abortExit.message: Cancel file transfer to the Digital Paper and exit from the Digital Paper App?
abortExit.title: Quit

abortExporting.message: Do you want to abort the transfer to the Digital Paper?
abortExporting.title: Confirmation

abortImporting.message: Do you want to abort the transfer to the computer?
abortImporting.title: Confirmation

abortTransferByUpdate.message:
Update the Digital Paper system software?
File transfer will be stopped when updating starts.
abortTransferByUpdate.title: Software Update

cancelDPAUpdate.message: Abort the software update for the Digital Paper App?
cancelDPAUpdate.title: Software Update

cancelDPUpdate.message: Abort the software update for the Digital Paper system software?
cancelDPUpdate.title: Software Update

delete.message: Do you really want to delete the selected item(s)?

deleteTemplate.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected item?
deleteTemplate.title: Delete

deleteWifi.message:
Are you sure you want to delete the settings for the following Wi-Fi network?
SSID: {{ssid}}
deleteWifi.title: Delete

pairingCancel.message:
Cancel Digital Paper pairing?

To restart pairing, either reconnect the USB cable, or perform a restart via the [Tools] - [Settings] menu.
pairingCancel.title: Connect to Digital Paper

rePairing.message:
Would you like to setup a Digital Paper connection?

After selecting a Digital Paper for pairing, connection information for all previously connected Digital Paper devices will be reset.
If files are being transferred, transfer will be aborted.
rePairing.title: Re-pair Device

releaseSyncFolder.message:
Delete sync setting?
If deleted the folders and files contained in this folder will stop syncing with the computer. 
Even if deleted folders and files will not be deleted.
releaseSyncFolder.title: Delete Sync Setting

releaseSyncSettingByOperation.message: This folder or subfolder was previously designated to sync with Digital Paper. Deleting or renaming this folder will delete the sync settings.  Do you want to continue?

resetAndExit.message:
Reset connection information for the currently connected Digital Paper?

Resetting connection information will also delete sync folder settings.

Selecting [Yes] will close Digital Paper App.
Restart the app to conduct pairing with the Digital Paper.
resetAndExit.title: Reset Connection Information

syncNow.message:
Sync folder has been set.
Start syncing now?
syncNow.title: Set Sync Folder

installCertName.message: Enter the name of the certificate.
installCertName.title: Install Certificates

installCertPass.message: Enter the password of the certificate.
installCertPass.title: Install Certificates

message.1:
An unknown error has occurred.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.11:
Cannot add Wi-Fi network. 
The number of Wi-Fi networks saved on the Digital Paper has reached the maximum limit. 
Delete unused Wi-Fi networks.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.12:
Cannot register the Wi-Fi network.
The value has not been configured correctly. 
Check the value you have entered.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.16:
A file name cannot contain the following characters:
    /
Enter another name.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.18:
A folder name cannot contain the following characters:
    /
Enter another name.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.23:
The file transfer will be cancelled. 
There is not enough space on the destination folder.
Delete unused files or select a different destination folder. 

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.24:
The operation cannot be performed.
There is not enough space on the Digital Paper. 
Delete unused files.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.26:
Pairing with the Digital Paper has failed.
The process has timed out after a period of time has passed.
Try again.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.3:
An operation for the Digital Paper cannot be executed.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.31:
The file name cannot be changed.
The length of the file name has exceeded the maximum limit.
Select a different name.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.32:
The operation cannot be performed.
A file with the same name already exists.
Change the template name.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.33:
Cannot check for updates.
Unable to connect to the Internet.
Check the network connection of the computer.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.34:
The update has failed.
Unable to connect to the Internet.
Check the network connection of the computer and try again.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.36:
Cannot update Digital Paper.
The device does not have enough battery left.
Recharge the device for a while and try again.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.37:
Cannot register the Wi-Fi network.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.38:
Cannot register the Wi-Fi network.
The process has timed out after a period of time has passed.
Reconfigure the Wi-Fi network.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.39:
Cannot register the Wi Fi connection.
The wireless router that you are trying to register is using an unsupported security method.
Change the security method of the wireless router or choose a supported Wi-Fi network.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.41:
Cannot register the Wi-Fi network.
Another process is already running on the Digital Paper.
Wait a while and try again.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.42:
Cannot connect to the Digital Paper.
Invalid pairing of the connected Digital Paper.
Restart pairing of the device.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.43:
Cannot turn on the Wi-Fi on the Digital Paper.
The device does not have enough battery left.
Recharge the device for a while and try again.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.44:
Cannot turn on the Wi-Fi on the Digital Paper.
Another process is already running on the Digital Paper.
Wait a while and try again.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.46:
Cannot install the certificate.
The certificate is using a file format that is not supported with Digital Paper.
Select a certificate that has a supported file format.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.47:
Cannot install the certificate.
The content of the certificate is incorrect.
Send an enquiry to your certificate vendor.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.48:
Cannot install the certificate.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.5:
You need a new version of the Digital Paper App to connect with the Digital Paper.
Download and install the latest version of the application from the following URL.

www.sony.co.jp/dpapp

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.51:
Cannot start software update.
Another process is already running on the Digital Paper.
Wait a while and try again.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.52:
Cannot register note template.
The number of note templates has exceeded the maximum limit.
Delete unused templates.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.57:
The operation cannot be performed.
The specified folder cannot be found. 
Click on the current folder from the list to refresh the display. 

Folder name
{{folder}}

Error code
{{errorCode}}
message.59:
The folder name cannot be changed.
The length of the folder name has exceeded the maximum limit.
Select a different name.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.6:
You need a new version of the Digital Paper App to connect with the Digital Paper.
Download and install the latest version of the application from the following URL.

www.sony.net/dpapp

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.75:
The operation cannot be performed.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.80:
The sync folder cannot be set.
The specified folder is included in the sync folder.
Select another folder.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.81:
The sync folder cannot be set.
The selected folder cannot be set as the sync folder.
Select another folder.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.86:
Syncing will be aborted.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.89:
The operation cannot be performed.
A folder containing the folder set for syncing cannot be operated while syncing.
Perform the operation after syncing is complete.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.90:
Unable to establish a Bluetooth connection.
Multiple Digital Paper devices are registered to this computer as Bluetooth devices.
On the computer, delete the registrations of Digital Paper units other than the one you wish to connect.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.91:
An operation for the Digital Paper cannot be executed.

Error code {{errorCode}}
message.93:
Cannot turn on the Wi-Fi on the Digital Paper.

Error code {{errorCode}}

btUnrecoverableError.message:
An error occurred while connecting through the Bluetooth function.
Please try the following after exiting from the Digital Paper App.

 - Turn off the Bluetooth function of the computer, and turn on again.
 - Turn off the Bluetooth function of the Digital Paper, and turn on again.
 - Restart the computer.
btUnrecoverableError.title: Digital Paper App

exportOnDocView.message: Click [Folders] from the toolbar and change the display mode before running the program.
exportOnDocView.title: Transfer Documents to Digital Paper

foundMultiBtDps.message:
Multiple Digital Paper devices are registered to this computer as Bluetooth devices.
On the computer, delete the registrations of Digital Paper units other than the one you wish to connect.
foundMultiBtDps.title: Connect

latestSoftware.message: Your software is up to date.

newerAppFound.message:
There is a newer version of Digital Paper App.
To update, download and install the latest version from the following URL.
www.sony.net/dpapp
newerAppFound.title: Software Update

newerSoftwareFoundByWiFi.message:
A new version of the Digital Paper system software is available.

To update the system software, connect the USB cable and select [{{menu.category.help}}] - [{{func.app.softwareUpdate}}].

unsynced.message: The device was not synced after the Digital Paper App was started.

updateTransfered.message:
Transfer of update file to Digital Paper has been completed and the update process has started.
Please wait until the update is complete and the device is reconnected.
If the window is not updated, restart Digital Paper App.

installCert.description:
In order to securely connect to the Digital Paper, a certificate must be installed on the computer.

Press [Next] to install a certificate issued by Digital Paper.
Your operating system may require confirmation from you before installation is completed.
The certificate to be installed will not be used for any purpose other than communication with the paired Digital Paper.

pairing.description:
Enter the authentication code that is displayed on the Digital Paper.

Enter into the following text box the authentication code that is displayed on the screen of the Digital Paper you wish to pair. Then press the [Next] button to continue.

setupComplete.description:
The procedure for pairing the Digital Paper App to your computer is complete.

We will now continue to product registration.

In order for us to provide the best support for the product you have purchased, we recommend you register the product. Customers who register their products are able to receive useful tips and promotional product information.

intro.jp:
The procedure for pairing the Digital Paper App to your computer is complete.

Visit the Digital Paper support site for the latest information and useful tips.
intro.us: The procedure for pairing the Digital Paper App to your computer is complete.

welcomeConnection.description:
Pairing with the Digital Paper.

When the Digital Paper is paired, it is possible to transfer documents between devices.

bt.message: The Digital Paper can also connect to a computer using the Bluetooth function. Please refer to the URL below for details.

wifiConf.description:
Setup the Digital Paper Wi-Fi network.
In order for the Digital Paper to communicate with a computer over Wi-Fi, both devices must be on the same network.

select.description: Select the Wi-Fi network used by the Digital Paper from the list of available networks.
select.label: Select from the list

wps.description: Setup using the Wi-Fi Protected Setup™ push button method or the Wi-Fi Protected Setup™ PIN method.
wps.label: Use Wi-Fi Protected Setup™

description.manual:
Setup the Wi-Fi network.
Enter all required items, and press the [Next] button.
description.wps: Select the Wi-Fi Protected Setup™ method.
description.wpsPin:
Setup using the Wi-Fi Protected Setup™ PIN method.
Press the [Next] button to generate a PIN code.
Use the displayed PIN code for the wireless router within two minutes.
description.wpsPush:
Setup using the Wi-Fi Protected Setup™ push button method.
Press the Wi-Fi Protected Setup™ button on the wireless router, and then press the [Next] button within two minutes.

dpStatus.label: Wi-Fi connection status of Digital Paper

result.prompt:
Press the [Back] button to try again.
Press the [Next] button to leave this unchanged.

status.description:
Even if the Digital Paper is within range of radio waves, if the Wi-Fi connection status remains as "Disconnected" or "Connecting", it is possible that the saved information is not correct. Press "Back" and confirm settings.

To exit, press "Next". Setting of Wi-Fi networks can be performed later on the "Settings" screen.

wpsPin.countDown: Enter the following PIN code on the wireless router in the next two minutes.

wpsPush.countDown: Press the Wi-Fi Protected Setup™ button of the wireless router in the next two minutes.

searchDp.description: Select the Digital Paper you wish to pair. The device ID can be confirmed from [Settings] - [System Information] - [Device Details] of the Digital Paper.
searchDp.title: Digital Paper App

introduce.message: The selected Digital Paper folder can be synced with a folder on your computer. Documents placed in either folder will be transferred to the other and both folders will be synchronized.
introduce.title: Set Sync Folder

ngResult.message: The folders and files below could not be synced.

proc.DPnoRoot: Unable to find folder set for syncing on Digital Paper.
proc.DPupdate: Unable to update file in Digital Paper.
proc.PCadd: Unable to add to the computer.
proc.PCdelete: Unable to delete file in the computer.
proc.PCnewFolder: Unable to create folder in the computer.
proc.PCnoRoot: Unable to find folder set for syncing in the computer.
proc.PCupdate: Unable to update file in the computer.

toPC.caption: Digital Paper files that failed to sync to computer
